Articles.Content:
nearly 8700 delta v in the main ship (not the lifter) to get it there.

this is the ship ( requires mec jeb as the ship itself has no room for error ) it can go to any non atmo planet. bit tricky but some fuel needs to be moved by hand.

http://www./?rxzprfg432avxkc

Eeloo is not much harder to reach than Jool, however it often take long time even on fastest warp. Guess Pol is more expensive. Moho is more expensive.

Lander look a lot like my designs, now you have to get the poor kerbals back.

lol nope its a one way.

You monster.

lol nope its a one way.

That doesn't count! Now get back to the drawing board.
Waiting for resources system to plan return trips with smaller rockets, avoiding massive lag at launch pad
even my best ships can just manage a low flyby and return, what will eventually happen is this will become a base. For science.
